changelog.version:
* Changed formula for how Old Shortcut reduces Continue On
* Repeat last action on list saves now
* Lootable first checkboxes save now
* Window title switches when paused correctly
* Dragging an action image doesn't change the URL in firefox
* 2 more story parts, unlocked at Small Dungeon completion
* Re-arrange icon/loop count order on lists
* Get Drunk removes 2 gold instead of adding it

* Sound on pause available in options
* training limit set to 50 from 10 (for now)
* Mana Original is multipled by # loops
* Travel Action styling change
* Saving in town 3
* DRAG AND DROP (Thanks to Hunter)

* Tooltip on reset button
* Glasses give x2 to forest
* Mana cost reflects the tooltips now rather than an average of stat reduction
* Trainings are capped at 10 per loop
* New actions! Brew Potions, Continue On, Explore City, Gamble, Get Drunk, Purchase Mana, Sell Potions
* Some new actions are usless at the moment.

* Reverted skill nerf (too harsh)
* Actually capped glasses
* Sell Gold -> Buy Mana
* Double soulstone recovery
* Nerfed practical magic (more uses for it later)

* Nerfed the soulstone nerf
* Cleared additional purple bars on exp
* Corrected glasses/throw party tooltips
* Actually nerfed skill growth - it's cheaper than before for level 2 - 23, and about 4x harder at level 100
* Add action to top of list option

* Added tab icon
* Throw Party costs 2 reputation from 3
* Removed Guided Tour
* Added Buy Glasses
* Fixed later segment names for Fight
* Nerfed soulstones
* Changed soulstone gathering, equalling about half previous rate but more initially
* Nerfed skill growth
* Added Options and Discord Link (to be expanded)
* Start Journey cost 2k -> 1k

* Added FAQ
* Doubled effectiveness of Guided Tour
* Fixed majority of memory leaks (not all)
* Made Heal/Fight requirements visible with training unlock
* Lengthened action list div
* Changed some wording of descriptions for clarity
* Added "lootable first" option, credit to Hunter
* Fixed a bug with extreme gain on Heal

* Mostly fixed import being all weird
* Changed investigate to be visible earlier
* Fixed Old Shortcut to be 100% from 110%
* Fixed Investigate to be 100% from 90%
* Rewording old shortcut and hermit
* Game autopauses if current list is empty
* Saves variables even if they're 0 (fixes some incorrect negative values)
* Fixes your save if your variables were negative.

* Added Learn Alchemy action and Alchemy skill
* Made a reddit post and discord
* Hid Skills that are at 0 exp
* Import/export

* Start Journey costs 2k mana from 1k
* Added Old Shortcut, Talk to Hermit, and Practical Magic actions
* Added Practical Magic skill
* Widened version tooltips

* Made Heal the Sick, Fight Monster, and Clear Dungeon more difficult
* Changing forEach to for loops, I forgot to change return to continue, causing multiple large issues
* Made stat window a little larger
* Changed town numbers to update on reload, instead of just on a new %

* Added Gather Wild Mana, Gather Herbs, Hunt, and Sit Under Waterfall
* Hide supplies/herbs/hide if you have 0
* You'll need to complete 1 more % on Forest Explored to update Mana Sources (NOTE: not anymore)

* Removed beautiful forEach loops because IE can't handle them
* Possibly fixes game not working on iPads too (tell me if so)
* Fixed errors for players with no save file
* Adjusted mana costs for new actions

* Added version info
* Added Haggle, Buy Supplies, Start Journey, Explore Forest
* Added switching towns and town names
* Added error messages when an action fails (red bar)
* Require reputation now requires, instead of costs
* Fixed repeating a last action with a cost bug
* Visually separated resources and main actions
* Reduced requirements/difficulty for heal/fight/dungeon
* WARNING: adblock caused game to freeze. This has no ads, disable if you also freeze
* Improved performance (since I was looking anyway)

body.tutorial:
TUTORIAL
Click the Wander action and click Play to start.
Wander for a bit, then smash pots.
Watch the numbers change, read all the tooltips.
Complete the town, go to the next one.

stories.story: Vous êtes un simple messager, en long voyage pour livre un colis prioritaire. A l'instant où vous arrivez en ville, vous trébuchez - cassant vos lunettes au passage - et le colis s'éventre, vous recouvrant d'un liquide étrange. Imméditament, votre maigre quantité de mana commence à s'évaporer à une vitesse folle. Alors que la dernière goute de mana disparait, vous vous retrouvez quelques instant plus tôt, alors que le liquide s'imprégnait dans votre peau, vos "réserves" remplies,... mais s'écoulant de nouveau rapidement. Ces quelques secondes se déroulent de nouveau, et de nouveau, et encore. Le monde autour redémarre avec vous, jusqu'à ce que vous décidiez de trouver une manière de prolonger ces "boucles". Des cristaux de mana sont souvent présent dans les poteries en ville, peut être que vous devriez commencer par là....

Vous arrivez au bout du donjon. Flotant sur un piédestal, une orbe brille doucement. Vous avez trouvé le coeur du donjon, du premier niveau du donjon en tous cas. Alors que vous vous en emparez, son essense vous pénêtre, imprégnant votre être de son pouvoir. C'est une petite quantité d'énergie, mais c'est un petit donjon. Vous reviendrez prendre ce pouvoir encore et encore, sachant qu'il restera en vous au travers des redémarrages de la boucle.

Vous arrivez de nouveau au fond du donjon, mais pour la première fois, le coeur ne brille plus. De tout temps, il s'est murmuré que les coeurs de donjons se régénérent en utilisant le mana qui les entoure, mais vous commencez à vous demander si l'essence de ses précédents incarantions ne le draine pas d'une manière ou d'une autre. Ce n'est pas systématique, mais vous devrez disséminer plus de mana dans le monde pour pouvoir bénéficier de la puissance du coeur. Vous levez les épaules, ne pouvant qu'accepter cette nouvelle originalité de la boucle.

tooltip.explanation:
Chaque niveau dans une statistique réduit pour une action la portion du coût correspondant à la statistique d'autant de % que le niveau. Le talent reçoit 1% de l'expérience du niveau, et est conservé au travers des redémarrages. Chaque point de talent augmente les gains d'XP de niveau de la statistique correspondante de 1%. L'XP de niveau gagnée pour une statistique donnée pour une action est (coût réel de mana/coût initial de mana) * (talent %) par tick. Le bonus d'XP est la combinaison du bonus des points de talents et des pierres d'âme.

Par exemple, Rencontrer des gens coûte 800 mana, et est répartit sur les statistiques

10%
Char
80%
Âme
10%.
Ce qui signifie que 80 points de mana sont attribués à

Soul

Char
.
So vous être niveau 20 en
Char
quand l'action débute, le coût réel en mana pour le charise est de 640 / 1.2 = 533.333
En ajoutant les 160 manas de
Âme
et

, le coût réel totla de l'action est (arrondi au supérieur) de 694, soit environ 15% de moins que le coût de base.
L'action donnerait (800/694)*(1+talent/100) XP de niveau par mana pour chaqu'un des 694 manas.

magic.label: Magie
magic.desc: Le contrôle de l'aether pour lancer des sorts et des invocations.

practical_magic.label: Magie Utilitaire
practical_magic.desc: Main de mage, magie de rue, détection de la magie, et d'autre tours utiles.
practical_magic.desc2:
Briser des pots et récolter du mana sauvage ont un coût en mana réduit de 1% par niveau (arrondi au supérieur).
Crocheter des serrures rapporte 1% d'or supplémentaire par niveau de 1 à 200 (arrondi à l'inférieur).
Courte quête rapporte 1% d'or supplémentaire par niveau de 201 à 300 (arrondi à l'inférieur).
Longue quête rapporte 1% d'or supplémentaire par niveau de 201 à 400 (arrondi à l'inférieur).

alchemy.label: Alchimie
alchemy.desc: Fabriquer des potions est une tâche pas évidente ! C'est une bonne chose que vous ayez trouvé un professeur.
alchemy.desc2: L'enseignant en Magie de la Ville du débutant adore l'alchimie. +1% à Leçon de magie (arrondi à l'inférieur) par niveau.

town0.name: Ville du débutant
town0.desc: La ville où toute histoire a un commencement.

town1.name: La forêt parsemée
town1.desc: Une forêt éternellement verte. Vous sentez le mana affluer autour de vous...

town2.name: Marchanville
town2.desc: Une ville qui mériterait une meilleur description.

tooltip.desc:
Le coût en mana est basé sur un ratio du % de stats.
Le gain d'XP est proportionnel aussi.
L'expérience est gagnée à chaque tick.

tooltip.higher_done_percent_benefic: Vous pouvez trouver plus de choses avec un meilleur %.
tooltip.mana_used_explanation:
Shows stat gain affecting speed.
Updates every completed action.
Accurate at end of run.
tooltip.add_action_top: Add action to top of list
tooltip.list_explanation:
Drag and drop the actions to re-arrange them.
The next list becomes the current list every restart.
One second = 50 mana.
Minimum 1 tick per action.
Restarts automatically upon no actions left.

wander.label: Vagabonder
wander.tooltip: Explorez la ville, à la recherche de secrets et trésors.

meet_people.label: Sociabiliser
meet_people.tooltip:
Ils ne vous laisseront pas partir avec un simple bonjour.
Débloqué à 22% d'exploration.

investigate.label: Enquêter
investigate.tooltip:
Vous avez entendu des rumeurs...
Débloqué à 22% de personnes rencontrées.

explore_forest.label: Explorer le bois
explore_forest.tooltip:
Quel endroit plaisant.
2x progrès avec des lunettes.

old_shortcut.label: Vieux raccourci
old_shortcut.tooltip:
Personne n'est passé par ici depuis longtemps.
Donne des herbes supplémentaires.
Donne des sujets de discussion pour l'hermite. Recevez 1% de récompense pour Parle à l'hermite pour chaque % de raccourci exploré.
Débloqué à 20% de bois exploré.

hermit.label: Parler Hermite
hermit.tooltip:
This old man is happy to have a listening ear, surely he has some useful knowledge. You hope.
Speed is 1% faster for Gather Herbs, Practical Magic, and Learn Alchemy per 1% of Hermit Knowledge.
Unlocked with both 20% Shortcut Explored and 40 Magic.

explore_city.label: Explorer la Ville
explore_city.tooltip:
Everyone is so busy, and there's so much to do.
2x progress with glasses.

get_drunk.label: Se Saouler
get_drunk.tooltip:
Sometimes you just need a drink.
Costs 2 gold and requires reputation greater than -3.
Costs 1 reputation.
Unlocked at 20% City Explored.

buy_glasses.label: Achat Lunettes
buy_glasses.tooltip:
That's not fair. There was time now. There was all the time I needed.
Now you have to get new glasses again for 10 gold!
Causes Wander to be 4x as effective for the rest of the loop.
Affects any action with the glasses icon
Can only have 1 Buy Glasses action.
Unlocked at 20% explored.

buy_mana.label: Achat Mana
buy_mana.tooltip:
1 gold = 50 mana. Buys all the mana you can.
Unlocked at 20% Explored.

train_str.label: Se Muscler
train_str.tooltip:
Build up those muscles. Again.
Has 4x exp/talent gain, and can only be done
times per reset
Unlocked at 5% People Met.

train_dex.label: S'exercer
train_dex.tooltip:
The kids are a little mad you're taking their playground. They'll get over it.
Has 4x exp/talent gain, and can only be done
times per reset
Unlocked at 15% People Met.

train_spd.label: Sprinter
train_spd.tooltip:
A new friend has a magical treadmill. Gotta go fast.
Has 4x exp/talent gain, and can only be done
times per reset
Unlocked at 30% People Met.

throw_party.label: Faire la fête
throw_party.tooltip:
Take a break and socialize.
8x people met % over Meet People for equivalent mana cost.
Costs 2 reputation.
Unlocked at 30% Investigated.

warrior_lesson.label: Appr. Combat
warrior_lesson.tooltip:
Learning to fight is probably important; you have a long journey ahead of you.
Requires 2 reputation.
Unlocked at 20% Investigated.

mage_lesson.label: Appr. Magie
mage_lesson.tooltip:
The mystic got you into this mess, maybe it can help you get out of it.
Requires 2 reputation.
Unlocked at 20% Investigated.

buy_supplies.label: Achat Vivres
buy_supplies.tooltip:
Prepare to move on.
Costs
gold.
You only need one set of supplies.
Unlocks at a combined skill of 35.

haggle.label: Négocier
haggle.tooltip:
They won't like you as much, but hey - you're leaving.
Costs 1 reputation to reduce the price of supplies by 20.
Unlocks at a combined skill of 35.

start_journey.label: Débuter le voyage
start_journey.tooltip:
Follow the trail to end up at the next town. You need to keep moving until you can learn how to shut these loops off.
Costs 1 supplies. Finish once to unlock Forest Path's actions, then finish this in order to use Forest Path's actions.
Unlocks at a combined skill of 35.

train_soul.label: Chutes d'eau
train_soul.tooltip:
It's peaceful here. Loud, but peaceful.
Has 4x exp/talent gain, and can only be done
times per reset
Unlocked at 70% Forest Explored.

practical_magic.label: Magie Utilitaire
practical_magic.tooltip:
Such simple uses to help out with everyday tasks. Genius, really. It's like pulling teeth getting this knowledge from the Hermit though.
Unlocked with both 20% Hermit Knowledge and 50 Magic.

learn_alchemy.label: Appr. Alchimie
learn_alchemy.tooltip:
You can listen to him yammer while making light healing and remedy potions.
You're starting to think the potion that caused you to loop time was a complex one.
You provide the ingredients; costs 10 herbs.
Gives alchemy and magic skill.
Unlocked with both 40% Hermit Knowledge and 60 Magic.

brew_potions.label: Créer Potions
brew_potions.tooltip:
Bubbles and Flasks. Potions and Magic.
Requires 5 reputation or he won't let you near his stuff.
Creates a potion from 10 herbs to sell at the next town.
Gives alchemy and magic skill.
Unlocked with 10 Alchemy.

continue_on.label: Continuer
continue_on.tooltip:
Keep walking to the next town, Merchanton.
Mana cost reduced by 60 per Old Shortcut %.

purchase_mana.label: Achat Mana
purchase_mana.tooltip: 1 gold = 50 mana. Buys all the mana you can.

sell_potions.label: Vendre Potions
sell_potions.tooltip: Potions are worth 1 gold per alchemy skill, but it takes a bit to find a seller.

read_books.label: Lire
read_books.tooltip:
There's a library! You always loved reading.
Discover new worlds and perspectives, get ideas from fiction characters, and empathize with the desire to be stronger.
Requires glasses.
Has 4x exp/talent gain, and can only be done
times per reset
Unlocks at 50% city explored.

smash_pots.label: Casser Pots
smash_pots.tooltip:
They're just sitting there, unbroken, full of potential.
Pots with loot in them have 100 mana.
Every 10 pots have mana.

locks.label: Crocheter
locks.tooltip:
Don't worry; they won't remember.
Houses with loot in them have
locks.tooltip2:
gold.
Every 10 houses have gold.
Unlocked at 20% Explored.

short_quest.label: Quête Courte
short_quest.tooltip:
Be a hero! ...If the reward is good and it doesn't take too long.
Short Quests with loot give
short_quest.tooltip2:
gold as a reward.
Every 5 Short Quests have loot.
Unlocked at 5% People Met.

long_quest.label: Quête Longue
long_quest.tooltip:
Be a more impressive hero! ...As long as someone is watching.
Long Quests with loot give
long_quest.tooltip2:
gold and 1 reputation as a reward.
Every 5 Long Quests have loot.
Unlocked at 10% Investigated.

wild_mana.label: Mana Sauvage
wild_mana.tooltip:
They're out of sight of most travellers, but you have time to find and harvest them.
Every good mana spot has 250 mana.
Every 10 mana spots have good mana.

gather_herbs.label: Récolter Herbes
gather_herbs.tooltip:
Might as well dig up anything useful you find.
Every 10 funny plants are herbs.
Unlocked at 10% Forest Explored.

hunt.label: Chasser
hunt.tooltip:
The forest provides.
Every 10 animals have good hides.
Unlocked at 40% Forest Explored.
NOTE: Using hide is not implemented yet. I'll remove this note when it is.

gamble.label: Parier
gamble.info_text3: People to check if they're suckers
gamble.tooltip:
The cards still somehow come out different every time.
Has 2x exp/talent gain
Costs 20 gold and 1 reputation.
Requires reputation greater than -5.
You win against every 10 suckers, and get 60 gold for winning.

heal_sick.label: Soigner Gens
heal_sick.tooltip:
You won't be able to heal them all, but they'll be thankful for doing what you can.
Healing is always 3 parts, each with a main stat - Diagnose (Per), Treat (Int), Inform (Cha).
Gives (magic skill) * (1 + main stat / 100) * sqrt(1 + times completed / 100) * (original mana cost / actual mana cost) progress points per mana.
Requires 12 Magic skill.
Gives 3 reputation upon patient completion.

fight_monsters.label: Tuer Monstres
fight_monsters.tooltip:
Slowly, you're figuring out their patterns.
Fighting rotates between 3 types of battles, each with a main stat - Quick (Spd), Defensive (Str), Aggressive (Con).
Gives (combat skill) * (1 + main stat / 100) * sqrt(1 + times completed / 100) * (original mana cost / actual mana cost) progress points per mana.
Requires 10 Combat skill.
Gives 20 gold per fight segment completion.

small_dungeon.label: Petit Donjon
small_dungeon.tooltip:
There are small changes each time; it's harder to get used to. The soulstones at the end last through loops, but they're not always in the dungeon... Strange.
The dungeon requires different skills at different points.
One action can clear multiple dungeons if your stats are high enough.
Gives (magic + combat skill) * (1 + main stat / 100) * sqrt(1 + times completed / 200) * (original mana cost / actual mana cost) progress points per mana.
Requires a combined skill of 35.
Gives 1 soulstone per completion - hover over Completed for info.
small_dungeon.completed_tooltip:
Each soulstone improves a random stat's exp gain by (1+(soulstones)^.8/10). Each soulstone reduces the chance you'll get the next one by 2%.
Chance to receive a soulstone recovers at .00002% per mana.

adventure_guild.label: Guilde
adventure_guild.tooltip:
The one stop shop for all your adventuring needs.
Take their tests and get a rank!
You can only join 1 guild at a time, and only try once.
Gives 200 mana per rank.
Gives ((magic skill)/2 + (combat skill)) * (1 + main stat / 100) * sqrt(1 + times completed / 400) * (original mana cost / actual mana cost) progress points per mana.
Unlocks at 20% rumors heard.
